data.text: Yaa Waaqa koo Mooticha, ani sin leellisa;
Ani guyyuma guyyaan sin galateeffadha;
Waaqayyo guddaa dha; galateeffamuunis baayʼee malaaf;
Dhaloonni tokko dhaloota biraatti hojii kee ni hima;
Isaanis waaʼee miidhagina ulfina qabeessa  surraa kee sanaa ni dubbatu;
Isaan waaʼee hojii kee sodaachisaa sanaa ni odeessu;
Isaan yaadannoo gaarummaa keetii baayʼisanii odeessu;
Waaqayyo arjaa fi gara laafessa;
Waaqayyo, nama hundaaf gaarii dha;
Yaa Waaqayyo, hojiin kee hundinuu si galateeffata;
Isaan waaʼee ulfina mootummaa keetii ni odeessu;
kunis akka namoonni hundi hojii kee humna qabeessa,
Mootummaan kee mootummaa bara baraa ti;
Waaqayyo warra kufan hunda ol qaba;
Iji nama hundaa si eeggata;
Ati harka kee balʼiftee
Waaqayyo karaa isaa hundaan qajeelaa dha;
Waaqayyo warra isa waammatan hundatti,
Inni fedhii warra isa sodaatanii ni guuta;
Waaqayyo warra isa jaallatan hunda ni eega;
Afaan koo Waaqayyoon galateeffachuudhaan ni dubbata.
